tests.title: affiche correctement le calendrier avec des événements

err.message:
CypressError: `cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://localhost:3000/calendrier

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 500: Internal Server Error

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Opérations du calendrier`
